.. _download:

Download
========

Current release
---------------

* Version: |version|

Stand-alone, binary distributions for Windows, Mac, and Linux will
be available soon.

If you have Python installed, you can get Wheelwright from the the
`Python Package Index <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/wheelwright/>`_, or
install it with::

    easy_install wheelwright

See the :ref:`User's Guide <install_guide>` for help on installing the
necessary prerequisites.

Development release
-------------------

The latest `development source
<https://bitbucket.org/biciworks/wheelwright/>`_ is available in a
Mercurial repository::

    hg clone https://bitbucket.org/biciworks/wheelwright
